I never received the ring I ordered. The package was marked as delivered even though I did not receive it. I asked the seller to contact the postal service to figure out what had happened. He never got back to me with an update. I contacted the local postal services myself and they informed me that something fishy had indeed taken place but as the package was uninsured, they would not proceed to investigate it. I only then found out that the seller had shipped the ring uninsured. It was not mentioned in the shipping terms and came as a very unpleasant surprise. I updated the seller on the information I received from my local post service but he didn‚Äôt get back to me. This was a deeply disappointing experience, I was very much looking forward to receiving the ring. Paid 30+‚Ç¨ for nothing.
